Who: Tuscon, Rat Trap, Kup, Quickstride
Location: Area just outside the location of the Black fortress

As the Maximals began to gather around Tuscon the large ediface that
was the black fortress quickly rose out of the large lake of magma
that it had been hidden beneath. The speed of the rise through off
great amounts of tremendously hot liquid rock, splashing the area all
around.

However what is even more disturbing is that as the base came up,
small guns and cannons extended themseves and oriented on the
different targets. Several of them glowed for a moment and then opened
fire on the maximals and Autobots that were present!

OOC: Keep in mind that there is still a lake of super hot stone/magma
seperating the Maximals from the fortress, like a large moat around a
castle.

Preston
